price: (Ànábì) Mūsā sọ fún ìjọ rẹ̀ pé: “Ẹ fi Allāhu wá ìrànlọ́wọ́, kí ẹ sì ṣe sùúrù. Dájúdájú ti Allāhu ni ilẹ̀. Ó sì ń jogún rẹ̀ fún ẹni tó bá fẹ́ nínú àwọn ẹrúsìn Rẹ̀. Ìgbẹ̀yìn (rere) sì wà fún àwọn olùbẹ̀rù (Allāhu).”
arabic: قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوۡمِهِ ٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱصۡبِرُوٓاْۖ إِنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ لِلَّهِ يُورِثُهَا مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦۖ وَٱلۡعَٰقِبَةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla mūsā liqawmihi is'taʿīnū bil-lahi wa-iṣ'birū inna al-arḍa lillahi yūrithuhā man yashāu min ʿibādihi wal-ʿāqibatu lil'muttaqīna
